00021 
00022 #ifndef NEWTS_LIST_H
00023 #define NEWTS_LIST_H
00024 
00025 /* This file defines the public interface to a linked list datatype. */
00026 
00027 typedef struct list
00028 {
00029   struct listnode *head;
00030   struct listnode *tail;
00031   int size;
00032   void * (*alloc_item) (void);
00033   void (*free_item) (void *data);
00034   int (*compare_items) (const void *one, const void *two);
00035 } List;
00036 
00037 typedef struct listnode
00038 {
00039   struct listnode *next;
00040   void *data;
00041 } ListNode;
00042 
00043 #ifdef __cplusplus
00044 extern "C" {
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 extern void list_init (List *list,
00048                        void * (*alloc_item) (void),
00049                        void (*free_item) (void *data),
00050                        int (*compare_items) (const void *one,
00051                                              const void *two));
00052 extern void list_destroy (List *list);
00053 extern int list_insert_next (List *list, ListNode *node, void *data);
00054 extern int list_insert_sorted (List *list, void *data);
00055 extern int list_remove_next (List *list, ListNode *node, void **data);
00056 extern int list_remove_match (List *list, void *data);
00057 extern void list_merge_sort (List *list);
00058 /* extern void list_natural_merge_sort (List *list); */
00059 
00060 #ifdef __cplusplus
00061 }
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 #define list_alloc_item(list)            ((list)->alloc_item ())
00065 #define list_compare_items(list,one,two) ((list)->compare_items (one, two))
00066 #define list_data(node)                  ((node)->data)
00067 #define list_free_item(list,data)        ((list)->free_item (data))
00068 #define list_head(list)                  ((list)->head)
00069 #define list_is_head(list, node)         ((node) == (list)->head ? 1 : 0)
00070 #define list_is_tail(list, node)         ((node) == (list)->tail ? 1 : 0)
00071 #define list_next(node)                  ((node)->next)
00072 #define list_size(list)                  ((list)->size)
00073 #define list_tail(list)                  ((list)->tail)
00074 
00075 #endif /* not NEWTS_LIST_H */
